snippet.title: The Cat: Why Do Cats Purr? and Other True Facts
snippet.description: But our behavior is sometimes baffling, and we're not always purr-fect. Yet you still love us! So it's time for us to set the record straight. We're ready to answer your questions and give you the cat's meow on why we do the things we do.

snippet.title: Do Cats Always Land on Their Feet?

snippet.description: Probably for similar reasons, the purr is used by adults in social and sexual contexts. For instance, an adult female will purr while suckling her kittens and when she courts a male. Again like the human smile, purring can be used in ...

snippet.title: The Feline Patient
snippet.description: Three major types of vocalization have been identified in cats: sounds made with the mouth closed (purr and trill), sounds ... While most, if not all, cats can purr, some of the exotic species do not purr in the same manner as thedomestic cat.

snippet.title: So! You Want to Get a Cat: An Animal Lover¿s Guide to ...
snippet.description: Why do cats purr? That has been as hard a question to answer as, “which came first the chicken or the egg?” My aim is not to solve the mystery; no one really knows why. But following are some of the suspected reasons why a cat purrs.
